content:
{"name": "Westford Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "2025 Closings: July 2 and 4, November 26 and 28, December 24, 26 and 31
The Westford Food Pantry currently supports individuals and families living in the following communities:  Westford, Chelmsford/North Chelmsford, Lowell, Billerica/North Billerica, Dracut, Groton, Littleton, and Tyngsborough.
Westford residents may receive a full order of food once per week.
Residents of other listed towns may receive a full order twice per month (every other week).
Proof of residency is required at registration. Acceptable documents include a driver’s license, utility bill, or any form of identification that shows your current address.", "email": "", "url": "https://westfordpantry.org/need-food-or-support%3F", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "20 Pleasant Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Westford", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "01886", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.5788454, "longitude": -71.48400649999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(978) 692-5523", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "15:00"}]}
